input.notes: PR #19312 references Jira ticket KAFKA-18943 in its title. The PR was a test update cherry-picked to the 3.9 branch. The Jenkins CI check failed but the PR was still merged by maintainer mjsax after receiving approval from lucasbru. The Jira ticket KAFKA-18943 is a Blocker bug about Kafka Streams incorrectly committing TX during task revocation, with status Resolved/Fixed, affecting version 3.4.0 and fixed in versions 3.9.1 and 4.0.0.
